shrimp.name: Minnaert
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.usage: Minnaert limb darkening term, with the limb darkening parameter "k", controlling the reflectance deviation from the Lambertian term ("k"=1) - the range of this variable is therefore [1,2], while other variants put this limb darkening parameter in the [0,1] range. The diffuse color value is passed to "aov_surfacecolor", and the diffuse value to the "aov_diffuse" AOV presets.
